title: Elderwood Bard Fanart!
body: I'm in love with Elderwood Bard! :3!!! I had to do a quick fanart pic of him~ I'll try to do something more exciting for him in my next pic. *~* The colors! I'm looking forward to his release!

replies.body: This is gorgeous! :3
Thank you~! :D
Alright real talk here. I've disagreed with a lot of Riots decisions lately, but this guy (especially this skin) is a major success in my opinion.

I was incredibly excited for this skin until I realized that there are no unique sounds for it. It's kind of jarring when he walks over his little wooden chimes and they make a metallic ching-a-ling. Especially considering how high of quality his default skin is, this factor has kind of swayed me into not buying this one. Missed design op for Riot if you ask me.
Yes.. I agree. He's so different and interesting.
already? u fast bro ! btw very nice art work love it
Haha yes! I saw it and I had to paint him! Didn't take too long. ^^ I wanna do a better piece soon though~

He's so cute ! ^^
I also did a fanart of him there : http://hellthings.deviantart.com/art/Bard-516991354 In some kind of chibi style Ã¨_Ã¨

[](http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2015/060/2/8/__bard___by_hellthings-d8jsx2y.jpg)
Bahh this is adorable!! *~* Great colors!!
He's. Just. So. CUTE!!!
He is *~*!
I'd like to make a thread of Bard Fan art....but i'm not that good.....so.......gonna post my pixels. Pls and Thx.
And here's an earlier concept:
Love it!! :D :D :D Haha~ This idea would be so fun animated!
Wow this is awesome!! I love this as a skin idea!

Most adorable magical sound potato in a Vandal Jax outfit and a flashlight. Ever.

(Not an insult.)
LOL I like this description
This is awesome! Elderwood Bard has to be my new FAVORITE release skin to date! And I agree with you. The colors!!! Beautiful.
Yes same with me! I can't wait to see what the splash looks like *~*

I hope they add some chimes or something to his modelâ€” perhaps hanging from his horns.
I like the concept of Elderwood Bard (friendly tree/forest spirit), but the model could use some more details to make it worth getting instead of just using Classic Bard.
oh that would be awesome~ I would definitely love to see chimes on him. And yes, I think his horn needs more detail. I wasn't sure what it was supposed to be. o.O Still not quite sure actually...
usualy the release skin isnt that special

> [{quoted}](name=zoran999,realm=EUNE,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=fzumef80,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-02-26T22:13:33.263+0000)
>
> usualy the release skin isnt that special

That's not a valid excuse; that's just a sweeping generalization.
Not all release skins are badâ€” Battlecast Vel'Koz, Galactic Azir, and Mecha Kha'Zix are from Riot's current pattern of one skin for each new champion, and they're all great.

Elderwood Bard has some nice features; I'm just saying it could use a little more stuff on the model. Stuff that the classic skin already has (it just needs to be adapted to the new theme).

OMG HES SOO CUTE! *Hugs him* 

#*Squee sound*

I bet if you hug a plushie of him, it makes a sound like a synthesized alpenhorn :D

... That's how they made his vocalization.
really cute! :D
Bard looks so cute! The colors are beautiful as well ^ ^

The first thing I thought of when I saw Bard was...Marshmallow man.

Then I thought giant beard, and then I thought creepy hobo kidnapper... The human mind is a strange thing, wouldn't you say?

I love this art though, nicely done!
haha yes~ I agree. 8D I thought he looked like a character from Spirited away! Probably why I like him so much. XD And thank you!
The littlest Bard. :3
He's so cute small 8D
Gosh this is just precious and amazing.  ;A;
Thank you~! :3
What did you create this in? It's awesome :D
